name: West of Loathing
descr:
Say howdy to [b]West of Loathing[/b] -- a single-player slapstick comedy adventure role-playing game set in the wild west of the [b]Kingdom of Loathing[/b] universe.  Traverse snake-infested gulches, punch skeletons wearing cowboy hats, grapple with demon cows, and investigate a wide variety of disgusting spittoons.

Talk your way out of trouble as a silver-tongued Snake Oiler, plumb the refried mysteries of the cosmos as a wise and subtle Beanslinger, or let your fists do the talking as a fierce Cow Puncher.  Explore a vast open world and encounter a colorful cast of characters, some of whom are good, many of whom are bad, and a few of whom are ugly.

Features:
[list][li] a sprawling open world, chock full of danger, quests, puzzles, and mysteries
[/li][li] lush hand-drawn black and white graphics
[/li][li] full stick-figure customization
[/li][li] thousands of jokes, gags, and goofs
[/li][li] crunchy turn-based combat (but only if you want it)
[/li][li] liberal use of the Oxford comma
[/li][li] over 50 hats
[/li][li] disreputable saloons
[/li][li] several gulches
[/li][li] a drunk horse[/li][/list]NOTE: characters are not literally colorful (the game is in black and white)
